title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Lithuania 2024
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: In general GDP growth compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.
GDP growth compared to previous year is slightly decreasing from 2014 to 2015, slightly increasing from 2015 to 2017, and finally roughly constant from 2017 to 2023.
The line rapidly increased by 76.17% from Year 2016 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum GDP growth compared to previous year, about 4.14 was reported at Year 2017
Minimum GDP growth compared to previous year about 2.02 was reached at Year 2015
min_summary: In general GDP growth compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.

mid_summary: Overall GDP growth compared to previous year has decreased over the Year.

Maximum GDP growth compared to previous year, about 4.14 was reported at Year 2017
Minimum GDP growth compared to previous year about 2.02 was reached at Year 2015
